answers.answer: The pressure is high likely due to the fact that his diabetes is inadequately controlled and therefore abnormal blood vessels are starting to form in his right eye impairing adequate drainage of fluid from his eye leading to high eye pressure.  If glaucoma medications are inadequate in bringing his pressure down in the immediate future, he needs glaucoma surgery to prevent additional vision loss.
